website_summaries.verdict: This compact machine combines Bissell's excellent suction power with a surprisingly long runtime for one of the best handheld vacuums on the market.
pros: Battery power lights show the charging level
Pet hair nozzle, crevice tool, and dusting brush included
cons: Dust cup eject button is right next to the power button, so be careful not to press it accidentally

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Vac Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a vacuum snob and have had so many hand vacs over the years. This is the best hand vac ever. I have 3 dogs now and now only one dog sheds. Everyday I'd run my sneakers against the nap to gather hair in between major vacuuming, bend over and pick up the hair a debris and walk it to the garbage. Now I can vacuum it up per sections that I know this dog hangs about the most. I also am able to vacuum my dryer vent, and the door rug that the dogs and toddlers are in and out of all day.
customer_reviews.author: Cjogradw

customer_reviews.title: Dog shedding? Not a problem
customer_reviews.text: I have a regular vacuum and a roomba but I have a problem. The roomba takes too long to get to a singular spot, and it's a hassle to get it there, not to mention my dog thinks the roomba is a savage enemy that needs to be destroyed. The regular vac I have just takes too much time to set up with a constantly shedding puppy. This Bissell is a god send, I'm able to manage the large amounts of fur being shed without having to constantly set up a vac. It's super easy to use and extremely straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: MASA

customer_reviews.title: Holds a charge, good suction, works on pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Finally! One of the BISSELL pet vacs that works. I went through a handful of others that wouldn't hold a charge. With this one, the suction is good and battery seems to be holding pretty well. Use this to keep our place tidy in general and because we now have a long-haired miniature dachshund with long fur. It's easy to clean-up couch cushions, corners and quick dry messes on floors with this. Definitely recommend for getting out pesky dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little handheld! Thank you Bissell!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this little beauty for five months now and use it regularly. It will deep clean a full size Buick Enclave SUV and our Chevy Camaro convertible in a single charge of the lithium ion battery. Easy to use: emptying the catch bin and cleaning it's filter is a breeze. I don't care that it doesn't have a wall mount charger because I store it in a small inexpensive zippered tool bag which also carries the attachments and charger. It gets a lot of use with no problems whatsoever thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good suction
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good suction, the attachments do a good job at pulling the cat hair up out of furniture and carpet on the stairs, but sometimes it's hard to get the hair to actually go into the vacuum instead of sticking to the attachment itself or stay on the furniture/rug. Battery charge lasted through two sets of stairs - can't ask for more than that!
customer_reviews.author: J. Berks

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs
customer_reviews.text: This suits my needs: able to pick up bits of food from the stove top and counters, picks up the clumps of cat hair scattered around by the Roomba, picks up human hair and random bits off of rugs and hard floors. I wish the crevice tool were longer to better reach between the counter and refigerator, but not much gets in there anyway.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works great for some surface areas and others not so much
customer_reviews.text: For a hand held vacuum it does pretty good. The suction isn’t the best but better than other ones I’ve had. For small clean ups, I would recommend. It depends on what fabric you’re using it on because for example, my bed, it will suck dog hair off from - but my couch - not at all. I have to use my big bissel for that.
customer_reviews.author: tasha lynn

customer_reviews.title: Little messes - be gone!
customer_reviews.text: How much do I love this cordless vacuum?! Omg, my cats make a mess, and bam! I’m on it! If my car is dirty, it’s not a problem with this baby! It’s sort of meh on dog hair on the carpeted portion, but I can live with that. It’s one of my clients who has a dog, not me, so it’s not a constant problem for me. I love how easy it is to clean, too. Thank you, Bissell!
customer_reviews.author: Tiggy

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum, sorry to see it discontinued.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item as a replacement and our used item did not work :-(. BUT I loved this vacuum enough to attempt to find a used one rather than upgrade to a new model, so it was good vacuum. We upgraded to thr Bissell Ion series and it is doing well so far -- pretty much the same design it is just purple instead of green.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: and with it it doesn't do much better. Even holding the attachment on so it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for use on upholstery. I bought to handle the dog hair on my furniture, and you have the physically hold the attachment onto the vac in order to use it. Without the attachment for pet hair it does not pick up the hair, and with it it doesn't do much better. Even holding the attachment on so it doesn't fly of every 2 seconds, it does not pick up the vast majority of the pet hair. I have found other uses for it, but not what I was needing it for.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D Skjonsby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a super job with dog hair on sofa and other quick clean ups!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ward

customer_reviews.title: no longer takes a charge
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2017 and used it sparingly — maybe 20 times over three years. That didn't require a lot of charging. Today it will no longer accept a charge, meaning that it's just another piece of electronic waste.
customer_reviews.author: Ronin Vato

customer_reviews.title: Good vaccuum overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for pet hair. It's not the miracle tool that will suck up every bit of hair but as long as you use the attachments, it works pretty good. It holds a decent charge and its super easy to clean out. I have 3 dogs and a bf that likes to get dirty, this vaccuum does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Vac
customer_reviews.text: I've generally owned other brands of hand-held vacs but I decided to try this one and I love it. I think it cleans the best, is easiest to empty, and has the most suction. Great little product.
customer_reviews.author: cshore7222

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is fine, does the job. Easily knock off the front as controls are too close together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super suction!
customer_reviews.text: This item is much improved over previous models. I have two of them. Very easy to clean, easy to recharge, and super suction My housekeeper loves it - because I use it in between and make her job easier. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: TRR

customer_reviews.title: ... not sure if really efficient - i found not easy to deal with - its quite heavy and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it 20 min the next day I received it - well I'm not sure if really efficient - i found not easy to deal with - its quite heavy and the brushes are maybe too stiff
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Lepage

customer_reviews.title: perfect for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: great for pet hair . i bought it to keep in the truck cab . handy , handy , handy . i have the stick model at home and it works great on hardwood floors or carpet and does not clog up . why didn't i have one of these before ?????
customer_reviews.author: duped by amazon again

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to clean my couches! It gets up all the dog hair and lint you can imagine. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: athompson

customer_reviews.title: Great handheld vacuum for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as my other handheld which is great. Its not super powerful as far as suction as my plug in handheld but that is fine because I needed it for ease of cleaning pet hair from the floor and couch. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Perez

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: needed a new handheld because my pet hair eraser died, this is a wonderful little unit
customer_reviews.author: Emily May

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small clean-ups
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for cleaning up sand and dog hair in the garage, which is why we purchased it. Charged up easily and has good suction for the jobs.
customer_reviews.author: I-lean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awesome. Holds a charge forever and is so useful with pets and children. I am thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than the Dirt Devil, but wish it was stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Li

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tidying small areas (tabletops, counters, etc.) in a jiffy. Picks up hair (human / pet) easily.
customer_reviews.author: CAB27

customer_reviews.title: Missing part and poor customer service from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The housing wouldn’t stay attached to the vacuum. It was a gift to my husband and he called Bissell, the manufacturer, using the customer service number on the package insert. He felt he was not treated courteously and the representative was disrespectful, for example, they asked why he hadn’t noticed there was a missing part. They have agreed to send this part, however. After taking the shipping and contact information we immediately received spam email from them. It made the customer service experience even more disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Smokeyjones

customer_reviews.title: Works like a good condom
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. Picks up dirty, dog hair and other small debris.
customer_reviews.author: PhoKing

customer_reviews.title: Much better then the lesser models.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cheaper earlier version of this vacuum and this one is hands-down a better unit. Glad I upgraded.
customer_reviews.author: jordan i lipman

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum has actually exceeded my expectations so far. I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: LindaMary

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, love the chargeable aspect, picks up dog hair great! Very easy to use on the stairs in my house, GREAT product GOOD price! Yes I would definitely purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.author: OrtegaM1789

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love!!! Ordered two to give one as gift....thank you
customer_reviews.author: tay194

customer_reviews.title: It's a great hand vac and more powerful than it looks
customer_reviews.text: It's a great hand vac and more powerful than it looks. Charge lasts for a long time and is quick to recharge. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it works great easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use it for all kinds of thing fast clean up?, edging, small floor areas, furniture
customer_reviews.author: Darlene De Mello

customer_reviews.title: The weight and angle I have to hold the vacuum..
customer_reviews.text: The angle I have to hold the vacuum in order to get the job done..
customer_reviews.author: mary sierra

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product that does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Weak suction :(
customer_reviews.text: The suction leaves a lot to be desired. The low price sucked me in, but I wish I would’ve followed my gut & got a dyson or Sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is not nearly as powerful as I would have liked and instead of dying before a charge
customer_reviews.text: This works well on small messes and hair in our home. However, it is not nearly as powerful as I would have liked and instead of dying before a charge, it gets less and less suction. Semi annoying, but for the price it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times so far. Suction remains strong between cleanings. Very pleased with ease of use. Durability is still in question, however the build seems very good at this point. Very pleased, so far.
customer_reviews.author: The Hispster

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible for me to keep the filter clean, not with the nasty stuff that gets trapped in there. I ended up buying a new one. Good battery power. Suction is decent (might have to cover your face to prevent from breathing in pet refuse). Long stalks of hay and other junk sometimes gets stuck in the nozzle and it needs to be dumped or fished out. Not at all complicated to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a quick clean
customer_reviews.text: Being on the go all the time doesn’t provide ample opportunity to thoroughly clean your household. This simple and powerful vacuum is handy for those small trouble areas and spot cleaning without the hassle of pulling your full size vacuum out of the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and really holds a charge!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this handvac! I waited and researched a ton before deciding on this one. I'm so glad I did. The suction is really effective, the tools are great, and the battery holds a charge much better than I expected. We've used it in the car, on the bare floor, on the carpeting, and on the furniture. It's handled everything great, and has only ever used up one of the 3 bars on the charge indicator. Definitely recommend this handvac.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyluvver

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design and ineffective suction. The intake is actually just a small, slightly recessed hole in the middle of the clear, otherwise closed plastic end. I was grinding this thing against the carpet, trying to get it to pick up test crumbs. Plus it is surprisingly heavy, which makes it awkward to use. Return in process.
customer_reviews.author: jfellina

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight easy to use vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have cats. So I have litter and hair. This has been perfect for daily use and other odd jobs. Easy to clean and also to charge and SUPER LIGHT-I have wrist pain; so this is a great vacuum for me.
customer_reviews.author: jordyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: What a time saver when cleaning around the litter box or cleaning out the car. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: staci b sims hill

customer_reviews.title: Hands-down the best handheld vacuum I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down the best handheld vacuum I've ever used. I have 2 small chihuahuas and 2 cats... this thing is incredible!!!! It gets a major workout and it's still going strong. I use it for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand vacuum! It works great! My dogs and pig shed sooooo much on our couch and this works so good! I wish I woulda known about this sooner so I coulda bought it sooner instead of the other vacuum that I got stuck with.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lamoureux

customer_reviews.title: Does great job removing hair and keeps me from dragging out ...
customer_reviews.text: Leather sofa and chairs. Two very large dogs. Does great job removing hair and keeps me from dragging out larger vac.
customer_reviews.author: B Square

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use on steps and furniture. Holds a charge well. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift so I don’t have a personal review.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and charges fast
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver on stairs and accessory heads get into corners and crevices. I am very happy with the purchase and would recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Tillson

customer_reviews.title: Good auction but a bit bulky to use in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good auction but a bit bulky to use in the SUV and truck, hard to get in the corners even with attachments. Worked awesome on the stairs and in the boat
customer_reviews.author: Aman cstmr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, gets the job done and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Awesome, Long lasting Battery, Light weight, fast charging, easy cleaning. Done!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Low Suction
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product because of the great reviews. My husband wanted it for his workshop. He said it had very little suction, so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: kate davis

customer_reviews.title: Never charged.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't charge - not even overnight. . The red light kept blinking. I called the number listed on the instruction sheet, and they were clueless. I tried to use it and it lasted about 3 seconds. and stopped.
customer_reviews.author: fragilefinger

product_meta.title: BISSELL Bolt Pet Cordless Handheld Vacuum Cleaner, 2133,Black With Chacha Lime Accents
product_meta.description: Style Name:Vacuum OnlySave time and energy cleaning up after pets with the Bissell Bolt lithium max pet cordless hand vacuum. It's easy to clean up pet messes with the specialized pet tools and up to 25 minutes of cordless suction (indicated by an easy-to-read battery-power light). the extra-large dirt bin allows you to empty less often in between cleans. Plus, clean turn filtration helps release excess dirt and debris when emptying. Specially designed tools help with pet-made messes: the crevice tool makes it easy to clean narrow spaces and upholstery, and the pet hair nozzle helps pull and lift up embedded hair and dirt from soft surfaces. Take the time and effort out of cleaning your home with the Bissell Bolt lithium max pet cordless hand vacuum.
feature_bullets: Buy BISSELL, save pets. BISSELL will donate $5 to BISSELL Pet Foundation for each Bot Pet Hand Vac purchase upon activation.
Make pet cleanup easy with powerful, cordless suction and tools designed for pet parents
Provides powerful, long-lasting suction for up to 25 minutes with lithium Ion technology
Extra-large dirt bin holds more debris for less time spent emptying
Clean turn filtration helps release debris and dirt when emptying
Battery-power light indicates battery level and charging progress

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
